mutants.code:
def characterReplacement(s: str, k: int) -> int:
    lookup = {}
    maxCount = 1
    i = 0
    j = 0
    res = 0
    for j in range(len(s)):
        lookup[s[j]] = 1 + lookup.get(s[j], 0)
        maxCount = max(maxCount, lookup[s[j]])
        while j - i + 1 - maxCount > k:
            lookup[s[i]] -= 1
            i += 1
        res = max(res, j - i + 1)
    return res

        res = max(res, j - i + 1)
    return res
